::Cerberus::

    He heard the new bots call out to Shredder. He saw their =
beast modes, he recognized them, they were his Brothers.
    "We are Typhon=
's Children," He said to them, showing his Beast Mode. "Who is this Shredde=
r you speak of?"
    Just then the Nemean Hydra walked up. "He is the leade=
r of the Destrons at this point. But I nominate you for leader, Cerberus."
=
    "I was planning on it anyway," Cerberus said. "I will have to talk with=
 this Shredder. The Destron base is destroyed, it will have to be salvaged.=
 I need to get to the Main Computer."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 15=
, 2000 2:38 PM
  Subject: They arrive at the destron base


     The two he=
el beast walked towards the destron base. They arrived quickly. 
  And call=
ed out..."We are here to talk to the one called shredder. Reply!!!"

      =
  eGroups Sponsor
